body.description: Brighten their day with a personal note and an elegant card!Beautiful note cards are a pleasure to send and to receive!Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 note cards and 15 envelopes.Note card interiors are blank for your personal messages.Smooth-finish uncoated card stock supports a variety of pens.Gorgeous image depicts a brilliant autumnal tree.Design is embellished with lustrous flecks of gold foil.Matching stationery envelopes complete the set.Note card set is suitable for gift-giving.Cards measure 5'' wide x 3-1/2'' high.Card set comes in a matching box with a clear acetate lid.Note card set is suitable for gift-giving. Read more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tree of Dreams Note Card Set Elegant cards are suitable for a variety of occasions

Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 note cards and 15 envelopes Tree of Dreams Gorgeous image depicts a brilliant autumnal tree. Design is embellished with lustrous flecks of gold foil. Superior card stock Inside, you'll find a smooth-finish writing surface—no smudging or streaking.Heavyweight card stock takes pen beautifully.Card interiors are blank to accommodate your personal messages. Stationery envelopes accompany the set Matching stationery envelopes.Envelopes are constructed of premium paper.We include an extra envelope just in case it is needed.

Whether you're celebrating a milestone occasion, a special moment, or "just because"... Quality note cards are a pleasure to use Keep a box on hand for whenever a personal note is warranted. Exceptional value Boxed set features crisp note cards of substantial stock and stationery envelopes constructed of premium paper.Tree of Dreams Note Card Set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Stay in touch Brighten their day with a personal note and a beautiful card! About our Tree of Dreams Note Card Set: Set includes 14 folded cards with blank interiors. Cards are embellished with gold foil. 15 stationery envelopes are also included. Cards measure 5'' wide x 3-1/2'' high. Stationery set comes in a matching box with a clear acetate lid.

Falling Blossoms Note Card Set Cherry Blossoms Note Card Set Peony Garden Note Card Set Candy Garden Note Card Set Tree of Hearts Note Card Set Golden Aspens Note Card Set Quantity 14 Cards, 15 Envelopes 14 Cards, 15 Envelopes 14 Cards, 15 Envelopes 14 Cards, 15 Envelopes 14 Cards, 15 Envelopes 14 Cards, 15 Envelopes Size Cards Measure 5" Wide x 3-1/2 High" Cards Measure 5" Wide x 3-1/2 High" Cards Measure 5" Wide x 3-1/2 High" Cards Measure 5" Wide x 3-1/2 High" Cards Measure 5" Wide x 3-1/2 High" Cards Measure 5" Wide x 3-1/2 High"

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at ''prices even a pauper could afford.'' Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These arrived beautifully packaged and suitable for gift giving. The cards themselves are high quality and elegant. There is a very subtle gold sheen that is tasteful and not overdone. The only thing that could have made these better was if the envelopes had the peel off seal. Not a deal breaker by any means. They're so pretty I don't want to use them :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice notecard
reviews.reviewText: Nice design and colors. Excellent quality paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A good quality and attractive as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I liked the tree on the note cards

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful cards. Great hostess gift too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colors are breathtaking.
reviews.reviewText: Don’t send too many Christmas cards anymore, so like these are beautiful year round notecards

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Liked the Design But Too Much Gold Highlighting
reviews.reviewText: I like the brand and have bought several note sets from them. I liked the design on the screen, but, when I recieved them, there was too much gold on the design for my taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cover & paper.
reviews.reviewText: Already had several compliments on these cards. They have a subtle beauty that is noticeable. Thank you so much!
